# Period.SequentialPeriodsFromMoments method

Returns a list of [`Period`](../Period.md) that represents time line for specified moment list.

If *moments* parameter is null always returns an empty list.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<Period> SequentialPeriodsFromMoments(IEnumerable<DateTime> moments)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| moments | Target moments. |

## Return Value

A IEnumerable that represents a sequential periods for this moments list.
